languages.text: "Доклады о состоянии корабля и команды. Обычно Лорд-капитана для такой рутины не отвлекают, но сейчас случай особый. Я все еще получаю рапорты, и они не обнадеживают. Чтобы корабль полетел, может потребоваться многое, вплоть до ваших личных переговоров с властями системы, где мы находимся. Так что готовьтесь выслушивать жалобы и прошения, Ваша Светлость. Заодно поглядите на тех, кто обычно трудится за шестью переборками от мостика. А им достанется честь лицезреть сво{mf|его|ю} Лорд-капитана".

"Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. I am still receiving updates from across the ship, and they are not encouraging. Getting this bird to fly could take a gargantuan effort, even so far as you personally negotiating with the authorities of the system we are currently in. So prepare to hear a bevy of complaints and excuses, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Take this opportunity to get a good look at the officers who work six decks away from the bridge. And they in turn will have the honour of beholding the visage of their Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Доклады о состоянии корабля и команды. Обычно Лорд-капитана для такой рутины не отвлекают, но сейчас случай особый. Я все еще получаю рапорты, и они не обнадеживают. languages.text: “是关于这艘船与船员状况的报告。领主舰长时间宝贵，通常不会亲自参加这种例行的简报会。不过，目前的状况很特殊。即便是现在，我也在不断收到来自舰船各处的报告，这些信息很让人沮丧。如果想让这只铁鸟重新飞起来，我们恐怕要付出巨大的努力，甚至可能需要您与我们所在星系的政府官员见面聊聊。所以，您恐怕要面对一箩筐的抱怨与借口了，舰长大人。您可以趁此机会好好看看那些军官们。他们的岗位距舰桥有六层甲板之远，但他们今天将有幸见到领主舰长本人。”
languages.original_text: "Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. I am still receiving updates from across the ship, and they are not encouraging. Getting this bird to fly could take a gargantuan effort, even so far as you personally negotiating with the authorities of the system we are currently in. So prepare to hear a bevy of complaints and excuses, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Take this opportunity to get a good look at the officers who work six decks away from the bridge. And they in turn will have the honour of beholding the visage of their Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “是关于这艘船与船员状况的报告。领主舰长时间宝贵，通常不会亲自参加这种例行的简报会。不过，目前的状况很特殊。即便是现在，我也在不断收到来自舰船各处的报告，这些信息很让人沮丧。如果想让这只铁鸟重新飞起来，我们恐怕要付出巨大的努力，甚至可能需要您与我们所在星系的政府官员见面聊聊。所以，您恐怕要面对一箩筐的抱怨与借口了，舰长大人。您可以趁此机会好好看看那些军官们。他们的岗位距舰桥有六层甲板之远，但他们今天将有幸见到领主舰长本人。”

languages.text: 「船とクルーの状態についての報告を申し上げます。ロード・キャプテンは通常、このような定期的なブリーフィングに出席するために、重要な業務から離れることはありませんが、今回は特殊な状況です。私は引き続き艦内より最新情報を受け取っていますが、楽観視できるものではありません。この鳥を飛ばすには膨大な努力が必要で、あなた自身が現在いる星系の当局と交渉することさえ困難な状況にあるのです。そういうわけですので、不満や言い訳が山のように出てくることを覚悟してください、{mf|陛下|陛下}。この機会に、ブリッジから6デッキ離れた場所で働く士官たちをよく見ておくと良いでしょう。そして彼らもまた、ロード・キャプテンのお姿を拝む栄誉に浴することができるのです」
languages.original_text: "Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. I am still receiving updates from across the ship, and they are not encouraging. Getting this bird to fly could take a gargantuan effort, even so far as you personally negotiating with the authorities of the system we are currently in. So prepare to hear a bevy of complaints and excuses, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Take this opportunity to get a good look at the officers who work six decks away from the bridge. And they in turn will have the honour of beholding the visage of their Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Berichte über den Zustand von Schiff und Crew. Der Lord Captain wird normalerweise nicht für derartige Routinebriefings von wichtigen Angelegenheiten abgezogen, aber wir befinden uns in einer einzigartigen Situation. Ich erhalte immer noch Meldungen aus dem ganzen Schiff, und sie sind nicht gerade ermutigend. Diesen Vogel wieder zum Fliegen zu bringen, könnte eine gigantische Aufgabe werden, selbst wenn Ihr persönlich mit den Behörden des Systems verhandelt, in dem wir uns gerade befinden. Bereitet Euch also auf zahlreiche Beschwerden und Ausreden vor, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Nutzt die Gelegenheit, um Euch die Offiziere genau anzusehen, die sechs Decks von der Brücke entfernt arbeiten. Und diese wiederum haben die Ehre, ihren Lord Captain von Angesicht zu Angesicht zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. languages.text: « Les rapports sur l'état du vaisseau et de l'équipage. D'ordinaire, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'interrompt pas ses activités pour assister à des réunions aussi banales, mais notre situation est sans précédent. Je continue à recevoir des rapports des quatre coins du navire, et les informations ne sont guère rassurantes. Faire à nouveau voler ce coucou risque de nécessiter un effort gigantesque, au point même de vous amener à négocier personnellement avec les autorités du système dans lequel nous nous trouvons actuellement. Préparez-vous à recevoir une litanie de complaintes et d'excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Et profitez de l'occasion pour découvrir les officiers qui travaillent six ponts en dessous de la passerelle. Ils auront en retour l'insigne honneur de contempler en personne le visage de leur {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. I am still receiving updates from across the ship, and they are not encouraging. Getting this bird to fly could take a gargantuan effort, even so far as you personally negotiating with the authorities of the system we are currently in. So prepare to hear a bevy of complaints and excuses, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Take this opportunity to get a good look at the officers who work six decks away from the bridge. And they in turn will have the honour of beholding the visage of their Lord Captain."

languages.text: «Informes sobre el estado de la nave y la tripulación. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán no suele desatender sus vitales obligaciones para atender sesiones informativas rutinarias, pero nos encontramos en una situación única. No dejo de recibir novedades de toda la nave, y ninguna es muy alentadora. Llevará un esfuerzo titánico hacer que este pájaro vuelva a volar, incluyendo la negociación en persona con las autoridades del sistema en el que nos encontramos. Prepárese para escuchar una letanía de quejas y excusas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Aproveche esta oportunidad para observar a los oficiales que trabajan a seis cubiertas del puente, y ellos, a su vez, tendrán el honor de admirar el rostro de su Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. I am still receiving updates from across the ship, and they are not encouraging. Getting this bird to fly could take a gargantuan effort, even so far as you personally negotiating with the authorities of the system we are currently in. So prepare to hear a bevy of complaints and excuses, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Take this opportunity to get a good look at the officers who work six decks away from the bridge. And they in turn will have the honour of beholding the visage of their Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Geminin ve tayfanın durumu. Lord Kaptan genelde kendi mühim işlerinden feragat edip böyle olağan toplantılara katılmaz lakin emsalsiz bir vaziyetteyiz. Hâlâ geminin dört bir yanından gelişmeler aktarılıyor ve pek de iç açıcı değiller. Bu kuşu tekrar uçar hâle getirmek muazzam çaba gerektirebilir. Öyle ki içinde bulunduğumuz sistemin yetkilileriyle bizzat müzakereye girmeniz dahi lüzum gelebilir. Demem o ki bir araba şikâyet ve bahane duymaya hazır olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Fırsattan istifade edip köprünün önünden geçme fırsat bulamamış subayları iyiden iyiye değerlendirin. Onlar da bu sayede Lord Kaptan'larının simasını görme şerefine nail olacaklar."
languages.original_text: "Reports on the condition of the ship and crew. The Lord Captain is not usually drawn away from her important affairs to attend such routine briefings, but this is a unique situation. I am still receiving updates from across the ship, and they are not encouraging. Getting this bird to fly could take a gargantuan effort, even so far as you personally negotiating with the authorities of the system we are currently in. So prepare to hear a bevy of complaints and excuses, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Take this opportunity to get a good look at the officers who work six decks away from the bridge. And they in turn will have the honour of beholding the visage of their Lord Captain."
